description.oldValue:
Organizers of a Teams meeting and participants will be able to choose a Calendar Show As status feature such as free, busy or OOF to reflect their status for the scheduled meeting. In addition, organizers will also be able to select private meeting functionality which will allow users to hide meeting details from other users when their calendar is shared.
GA date: April CY2022
description.newValue:
Organizers of a Teams meeting and participants will be able
to choose a Calendar Show As status feature such as free, busy or OOF to
reflect their status for the scheduled meeting. In addition, organizers will
also be able to select private meeting functionality which will allow users to
hide meeting details from other users when their calendar is shared.
